attributes.action: Regulate resellers of electrical goods that have to be installed by electricians
attributes.additional_details: Unfortunately resellers are buying from third parties resulting in counterfeit and stolen products getting into the supply chain with no concern over the authenticity of the product  We want to change the law so that all resellers are licenced by a governing body they would have to purchase their stock directly from the manufacturer or a licenced distributer this would prevent them from purchasing stock via unlicensed third parties to stop the possibility of fire or electrocution by the end user
attributes.background: Set up a governing body to licence resellers of electrical goods that by law have to be installed by a qualified electrician

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
